question: Neither the manager nor his assistants ___ prepared for the inspection.

High levels of stress ___ hormonal imbalance.
Either the musicians or the conductor ___ at fault.
Ten kilometers ___ a long distance to run without training.
There ___ to be multiple errors in this document.

None of the participants ___ allowed to use calculators.
The team, after hours of deliberation, ___ to withdraw.

Each of the reports ___ a signature before submission.
Not only the director but also the actors ___ criticized.
Here ___ the finalists of the competition.
More than one scientist ___ raised concerns about the findings.
Either the lions or the elephant ___ escaped from the enclosure.
The data ___ a correlation between sleep and memory.
